Flow.description: This Process is used to handle all the declerative Action on case Sobject

value.stringValue: IF( NOT(ISNEW()) && [Case].Create_Survey__c =True && IsChanged([Case].Status) && IsPickVal([Case].Status,'Closed') && ( AND( OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type__c,"ClearSave")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type__c,"Free Support")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type__c,"Tax Cloud")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type__c,"Free Support")) ), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type_1__c,"Process")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type_1__c,"E-Filing")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type_1__c,"Not clear question")) ), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type_2__c,"Not clear question")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type_2__c,"No query")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type_2__c,"Spam")), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Issue_Type_2__c,"Issue Unclear")) ) ) && [Case].RecordTypeId =$Label.B2C_RecordTypeId ) && NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactEmail) ) && NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactId)) && [Case].Survey_send__c = 0 && [Case].Do_not_send_CSAT__c = False ,true, false )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_4
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISNEW()) && {!myVariable_current.Create_Survey__c} =True && IsChanged({!myVariable_current.Status}) && IsPickVal({!myVariable_current.Status},'Closed') && ( AND( OR(NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type__c},"ClearSave")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type__c},"Free Support")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type__c},"Tax Cloud")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type__c},"Free Support")) ), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type_1__c},"Process")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type_1__c},"E-Filing")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type_1__c},"Not clear question")) ), OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type_2__c},"Not clear question")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type_2__c},"No query")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type_2__c},"Spam")), NOT(ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Issue_Type_2__c},"Issue Unclear")) ) ) && {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} ={!$Label.B2C_RecordTypeId} ) && NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.ContactEmail}) ) && NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.ContactId})) && {!myVariable_current.Survey_send__c} = 0 && {!myVariable_current.Do_not_send_CSAT__c} = False ,true, false )

value.stringValue: ( ISCHANGED([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c) && ( [Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c!=null && ( CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"vulnerability") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"hack") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"forgery") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"theft") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"attack") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"security") ) ) ) || ( ISCHANGED([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ) && ( [Case].Latest_CaseComment__c !=null && ( CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"vulnerability") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"hack") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"forgery") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"theft") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"attack") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c,"security") ) ) )

( ISCHANGED([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c) && ( [Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c!=null && ( CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"vulnerability") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"hack") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"forgery") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"theft") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"attack") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_EmailMessage__c,"security") ) ) ) || ( ISCHANGED([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ) && ( [Case].Latest_CaseComment__c !=null && ( CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"vulnerability") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"hack") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"forgery") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"theft") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c ,"attack") || CONTAINS([Case].Latest_CaseComment__c,"security") ) ) )

IF( NOT(ISNEW()) && [Case].Create_Survey__c = True && IsChanged([Case].Status) && IsPickVal([Case].Status,'Solved') && ( [Case].RecordTypeId =$Label.Case_RecordTypeId_B2B_Enterprise || [Case].RecordTypeId = $Label.Case_RecordTypeId_B2B_CA_SME || [Case].RecordTypeId = $Label.E_Invoicing_Reccord_Type_Id ) && NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactEmail) ) && NOT(ISBLANK([Case].ContactId)) && [Case].Survey_send__c = 0 && [Case].Do_not_send_CSAT__c = False ,true, false )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_6
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISNEW()) && {!myVariable_current.Create_Survey__c} = True && IsChanged({!myVariable_current.Status}) && IsPickVal({!myVariable_current.Status},'Solved') && ( {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} ={!$Label.Case_RecordTypeId_B2B_Enterprise} || {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} = {!$Label.Case_RecordTypeId_B2B_CA_SME} || {!myVariable_current.RecordTypeId} = {!$Label.E_Invoicing_Reccord_Type_Id} ) && NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.ContactEmail}) ) && NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.ContactId})) && {!myVariable_current.Survey_send__c} = 0 && {!myVariable_current.Do_not_send_CSAT__c} = False ,true, false )

value.stringValue: ISCHANGED([Case].Is_Internal_Comment_Created__c) && IsPICKVAL([Case].Owner:User.User_Role_Type__c ,'GST Dev On Call Team') && NOT( ISBLANK( [Case].Previous_Owner__c )) && NOT(ISBLANK([Case].Previous_Owner_EmailId__c)) && [Case].Is_Internal_Comment_Created__c && [Case].Do_not_send_Automated_mails__c = False

formulas.name: formula_myRule_8
formulas.expression: ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Is_Internal_Comment_Created__c}) && IsPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Owner:User.User_Role_Type__c} ,'GST Dev On Call Team') && NOT( ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Previous_Owner__c} )) && NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Previous_Owner_EmailId__c})) && {!myVariable_current.Is_Internal_Comment_Created__c} && {!myVariable_current.Do_not_send_Automated_mails__c} = False
